title: Neoplatonism, Gnosticism, and Naturalism w/ Sam Adams
description:
Sam and I discuss Neoplatonism in depth especially its connections to Christianity, Gnosticism, and naturalistic theories such as evolution.

Sam's channel:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg7Ed0lecvko58ibuX1XHng
